title: Computer-Based Teacher Education Program for Integrating PCK with TPACK

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners simultaneously apply PPK (Pedagogical Physics Knowledge) and PCK (Pedagogical Content Knowledge) in an integrated environment using personal devices, with project-based assessments validating practical skills

learning_goals: Learners can design instructional strategies that effectively integrate multiple representations (text, graphs, charts, etc.) in social studies classes
Learners can develop lesson designs integrating general pedagogical knowledge (PPK) and pedagogical content knowledge (PCK) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can analyze three or more cases of PPK-PCK integration by performing simulation tasks in computer-based learning environments.

resources: Social Studies Multimodal Representation Resource Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
